name: Sake Sunrise
recipeYield: Ten servings of four ounces each
keywords: dried apricots, dried peach, sake, fall, spring, summer, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 cup hot sake, just below boiling
1/4 stick vanilla pod (about 1 inch on the pod)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine dry ingredients in a closeable basket strainer. Immerse in hot sake and steep two hours.
Add room-temperature sake, and leave in a cool place (40 to 55 degrees).
Infuse (strainer in liquid) for one week. Remove strainer. Serve chilled, shaken with ice. Sake will keep one week, refrigerated.
